No surprise, considering how great the original was.

snippet.textDisplay: @DLPBurke even if it were (which it isn't, by the way), majority opinion is responsible for all the failures in our oval office.  majority opinion is responsible for justin bieber and ke$ha's financial livelihood.  majority opinion is consistently the last ditch effort from someone in denial.  the majority's opinion is never inherently wrong, it's just never inherently right.  you could really be the poster child for a musical illiteracy awareness campaign though.
snippet.textOriginal: @DLPBurke even if it were (which it isn't, by the way), majority opinion is responsible for all the failures in our oval office.  majority opinion is responsible for justin bieber and ke$ha's financial livelihood.  majority opinion is consistently the last ditch effort from someone in denial.  the majority's opinion is never inherently wrong, it's just never inherently right.  you could really be the poster child for a musical illiteracy awareness campaign though.

snippet.textDisplay: @DLPBurke you should take your own advice before you suggest others to.  the measures in the a section of this song alternate between VImaj7 and vm9 just as secret of the forest does, with identical chord voicings, and the ascending melody consisting entirely of sixteenth notes is the secret of the forest melody verbatim, as it highlights specific chord tones down to the note.  you can decorate it with whatever words you like but the similarities are beyond uncanny.
snippet.textOriginal: @DLPBurke you should take your own advice before you suggest others to.  the measures in the a section of this song alternate between VImaj7 and vm9 just as secret of the forest does, with identical chord voicings, and the ascending melody consisting entirely of sixteenth notes is the secret of the forest melody verbatim, as it highlights specific chord tones down to the note.  you can decorate it with whatever words you like but the similarities are beyond uncanny.

snippet.textDisplay: @DLPBurke the facts?.. i doubt you've even made the effort to transcribe the song
snippet.textOriginal: @DLPBurke the facts?.. i doubt you've even made the effort to transcribe the song

snippet.textDisplay: @DLPBurke i hope you're kidding.  this is as blatant as plagiarism gets.
snippet.textOriginal: @DLPBurke i hope you're kidding.  this is as blatant as plagiarism gets.

snippet.textDisplay: I disagree. When it hits the bridge, I feel the melody to be endless and awesome. Just because it's a louder doesn't mean that it's bad. I believe you all are biased toward Chrono Trigger because of its classic status. Nevertheless, I have to agree that the blend of harmonies with Secret of the Forest is unmatched.
snippet.textOriginal: I disagree. When it hits the bridge, I feel the melody to be endless and awesome. Just because it's a louder doesn't mean that it's bad. I believe you all are biased toward Chrono Trigger because of its classic status. Nevertheless, I have to agree that the blend of harmonies with Secret of the Forest is unmatched.

snippet.textDisplay:
@DLPBurke  doesn't really do that, either. the same type of bass, yeah, but aside from that they're all pretty different. acoustic guitar vs. harp, bagpipe-esque instrument vs. flute, etc. and the only real similarity is the central riff anyway - after it starts going places, they're completely different songs.

in general, you're hilariously angry reaction just kind of proves that you don't really know much about what you're talking about.
snippet.textOriginal:
@DLPBurke  doesn't really do that, either. the same type of bass, yeah, but aside from that they're all pretty different. acoustic guitar vs. harp, bagpipe-esque instrument vs. flute, etc. and the only real similarity is the central riff anyway - after it starts going places, they're completely different songs.

in general, you're hilariously angry reaction just kind of proves that you don't really know much about what you're talking about.

snippet.textDisplay:
The chords are VERY similar in both this and CT's theme, to the point where this sounds like an improvisation over the original tune. The style of the new melody borrows alot from CT too (think of the ocean palace theme compared the the forst).

If this had been posted as an OC remix of the Chrono Trigger theme, I wouldn't have had any trouble believing it.
snippet.textOriginal:
The chords are VERY similar in both this and CT's theme, to the point where this sounds like an improvisation over the original tune. The style of the new melody borrows alot from CT too (think of the ocean palace theme compared the the forst).

If this had been posted as an OC remix of the Chrono Trigger theme, I wouldn't have had any trouble believing it.
